text: ```I am adding a button module to a template but I can not seem to get the override_default_style working. Any thoughts are appreciated. Here is the hubl code I am using: {% module "button" path="@HubSpot/button" button_text="Get Started", styles={"override_default_style":true,"button_color": {"color":"#000000","opacity":100}} %}```

<@U6GNQ7JBU> Thanks for the help earlier. The global content styles you switched to True, is that in the theme files? I am trying to get a better understanding of the issue so when I work on future themes I can avoid this issue.
